hero.title:
50-Day Parental Conditioning Reversal Plan,
Start your self-transformation journey
hero.subtitle: Designed for those who have experienced parental control and suppression, leading to lack of self-exploration and self-love. Our 50-day systematic plan helps you rebuild confidence, self-esteem, and identity.

identity.title: Lack of Identity
identity.desc: Living according to parental expectations, unclear about your true desires, struggling to establish your own identity

confidence.title: Insufficient Confidence
confidence.desc: Excessive criticism makes it difficult to believe in your abilities, fear of failure, reluctance to try new things

boundaries.title: Blurred Boundaries
boundaries.desc: Difficulty saying "no" to parents, overly concerned with others' opinions, sacrificing your needs to please others

communication.title: Communication Struggles
communication.desc: Feeling anxious when communicating with parents, unable to express true thoughts, prone to conflict or avoidance

social.title: Limited Social Circle
social.desc: Lack of social confidence, few friends, difficulty building intimate relationships, prone to loneliness

direction.title: Lost Direction
direction.desc: Unclear about interests, values, and goals, feeling confused about the future, lacking motivation to move forward

features.title: Six Core Modules for Complete Self-Transformation
features.subtitle: The perfect combination of professional psychological tools and practical skills to help you gradually regain confidence and autonomy

selfDiscovery.title: Self-Discovery Module
selfDiscovery.desc: Rediscover your authentic self through professional tests and guided exercises

list.item1: Personality Tests: Based on professional psychological theories to help you understand your personality traits, strengths, and weaknesses
list.item2: Interest Exploration: Through interactive questions and activities, guide you to discover neglected interests and hobbies
list.item3: Values Assessment: Clarify the life principles and beliefs you truly value, providing internal guidance for decision-making

selfCare.title: Self-Care Module
selfCare.desc: Learn to accept and care for yourself, establishing a healthy relationship with yourself

list.item1: Mindfulness Practice: Through guided meditation, help you focus on the present, accept emotions, and relieve stress and anxiety
list.item2: Self-Affirmation Exercises: Daily positive self-suggestions to help rebuild a positive self-image
list.item3: Emotion Tracking: Track emotional changes, identify triggers, and learn to better manage emotions

goalSetting.title: Goal Setting & Planning Module
goalSetting.desc: Build your life blueprint and realize self-value step by step

list.item1: Personal Goal Setting: Based on your interests and values, set short-term and long-term goals
list.item2: Action Plan Development: Break down big goals into executable small steps and develop detailed action plans
list.item3: Progress Tracking & Feedback: Visualize goal completion progress, receive timely encouragement and adjustment suggestions

communication.title: Communication Skills Enhancement Module
communication.desc: Learn to express yourself, establish healthy boundaries, and improve relationships with parents

list.item1: Communication Courses: Provide techniques and methods for healthy communication, learn to express feelings and needs
list.item2: Simulated Dialogue Practice: Through interactive scenarios, practice how to communicate effectively with parents
list.item3: Case Sharing: Learn from real parent-child communication cases, gain practical experience and solutions

socialExpansion.title: Social Expansion Module
socialExpansion.desc: Break social isolation and build a healthy network of relationships

list.item1: Social Activity Recommendations: Based on your interests and location, recommend suitable online and offline social activities
list.item2: Interest Group Matching: Join like-minded interest groups, share experiences, and build connections
list.item3: Social Skills Training: Learn practical social skills, boost confidence, and better interact with others

learningGrowth.title: Learning & Growth Module
learningGrowth.desc: Continuous learning, constant progress, expanding life possibilities

list.item1: Online Course Resources: Curated quality courses in career skills, interest cultivation, mental health, and more
list.item2: Learning Plan Development: Help you create personalized learning plans to improve learning efficiency
list.item3: Learning Progress Tracking: Record learning outcomes, provide feedback and evaluation, maintain learning motivation

identity.title: Clear Self-Identity
identity.desc: Understand your authentic self, establish independent identity, no longer living to meet parental expectations

confidence.title: Enhanced Confidence
confidence.desc: Recognize and accept your strengths and weaknesses, establish healthy self-evaluation, dare to face challenges

boundaries.title: Healthy Personal Boundaries
boundaries.desc: Learn to establish and maintain personal boundaries, avoid excessive accommodation of others, protect your emotional health

communication.title: Improved Family Relationships
communication.desc: Master healthy communication skills, establish more equal and understanding relationships with parents

social.title: Rich Social Life
social.desc: Expand social circles, make like-minded friends, build a healthy support network

direction.title: Clear Life Direction
direction.desc: Find goals that align with your values, plan a clear life path, full of forward momentum

growth.title: Continuous Personal Growth
growth.desc: Develop lifelong learning habits, constantly expand capability boundaries, realize self-value

happiness.title: More Fulfilling Happiness
happiness.desc: Live authentically, enjoy a self-chosen life, experience inner satisfaction and happiness

howItWorks.title: How to Start Your Transformation Journey

step1.title: Download & Install
step1.desc: Download the "Life Transformation" app from the App Store or Google Play and install it on your device

step2.title: Complete Assessment
step2.desc: Complete the initial assessment questionnaire to help us understand your specific situation and needs

step3.title: Get Personalized Plan
step3.desc: Based on your assessment results, we will customize a personalized growth plan for you

step4.title: Follow the Plan
step4.desc: Invest 15-30 minutes daily to complete exercises and tasks in the app, grow gradually

step5.title: Track Progress
step5.desc: Regularly review your progress, adjust your plan, celebrate every small achievement

fiftyDayPlan.title: 50-Day Transformation Plan
fiftyDayPlan.subtitle: Scientifically designed 50-day plan, requiring only 15-30 minutes daily, to gradually change your thinking patterns and build healthy self-awareness

phase1.title: Awareness Phase (Days 1-10)
phase1.desc: Identify the effects of parental conditioning, notice your thought patterns and emotional responses, begin building self-awareness

phase2.title: Self-Discovery Phase (Days 11-20)
phase2.desc: Deeply understand your interests, values, and talents, begin establishing an independent identity

phase3.title: Behavior Reshaping Phase (Days 21-30)
phase3.desc: Establish new healthy habits, learn to set boundaries, change behavioral patterns that hinder self-growth

phase4.title: Relationship Adjustment Phase (Days 31-40)
phase4.desc: Reassess and adjust relationships with parents and others, establish healthy interaction patterns

phase5.title: Future Planning Phase (Days 41-50)
phase5.desc: Based on your authentic self and values, plan your life direction and set goals that align with your inner desires

testimonial1.text: "After using 'Life Transformation' for three months, I finally had the courage to discuss my true academic interests with my parents. The communication skills I learned through the app allowed me to clearly express my thoughts, rather than avoiding conflict as before. Now I'm pursuing my passion for music, and my parents have begun to respect my choices."
testimonial1.name: Li Ming, 24

testimonial2.text: "All my life, I've made every decision according to my parents' expectations, completely unaware of what I like. The self-discovery module of 'Life Transformation' helped me discover my passion for psychology. Now I'm not only taking relevant courses but also joined interest groups where I've met many like-minded friends. For the first time, I feel like I'm living for myself."
testimonial2.name: Zhang Ting, 28

testimonial3.text: "I used to be very afraid of socializing, always feeling not good enough. The mindfulness practices and self-affirmation training in the app helped me gradually build confidence. Through the social expansion module, I attended several small events, and now I can naturally communicate with people and even made a few good friends. Thank you 'Life Transformation' for giving me the courage to try new things."
testimonial3.name: Wang Qiang, 31

appPreview.title: App Prototype Preview in Different Styles
appPreview.subtitle: Explore the various interface styles we've created for different users, find the experience that suits you

easternStyle.title: Eastern Zen Style
easternStyle.desc: Blending traditional Eastern aesthetics with modern design, creating a calm, peaceful atmosphere to help users settle their minds and find inner balance. Suitable for users who enjoy meditation and self-reflection.
easternStyle.feature1: Ink painting visual elements and gradient tones
easternStyle.feature3: Traditional philosophical wisdom integrated into functional design

magicStyle.title: Magical Fantasy Style
magicStyle.desc: Integrating the self-growth journey into a magical worldview, stimulating users' curiosity and creativity through fantasy elements, making the growth process more interesting. Suitable for users wanting to add fun to their journey.
magicStyle.feature2: Growth tasks designed as magical adventures
magicStyle.feature3: Achievement system like upgrading magical abilities

techStyle.title: Modern Tech Style
techStyle.desc: Adopting clean, modern tech aesthetics, providing clear, intuitive data visualization and tool processes, focusing on efficiency and practicality. Suitable for rational, results-oriented users.
techStyle.feature1: Minimalist modern interface design and color scheme
techStyle.feature3: Efficient, convenient tool set and quick operations

onboarding.title: Onboarding Flow Preview
onboarding.desc: Carefully designed new user guidance process, through clear and concise steps, helping users quickly understand the app's core features and value, enhancing first-use experience.
onboarding.feature1: Intuitive and easy-to-understand usage guidance and tips
onboarding.feature2: Personalized initial assessment and plan customization
onboarding.feature3: Progressive feature introduction without creating pressure

paywall.title: Subscription Screen Preview
paywall.desc: Clearly display subscription plans and value, helping users make decisions easily. We emphasize transparency and value communication, ensuring users understand all the benefits they receive.
paywall.feature1: Transparent, clear pricing and benefit comparison
paywall.feature2: Flexible and diverse subscription period options
paywall.feature3: Safe and reliable payment process guarantee

pricing.title: Choose the Plan That Fits You
pricing.subtitle: Flexible subscription options to meet needs at different stages

guarantee.title: 7-Day Unconditional Refund Guarantee
guarantee.desc: If you're not satisfied with the subscription service, you can request a full refund within 7 days, no questions asked

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a1: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime in your account settings. After cancellation, you can still use the paid service until the end of your current subscription period.
faq.q2: Can I use the same account on different devices?
faq.a2: Yes. One account can be logged in on multiple devices simultaneously, and your data will be automatically synchronized to ensure a seamless experience.
faq.a3: Based on your needs, goals, and preferences, we match you with the most suitable coach from our rigorously screened professional coaching team. You can request a change after the initial session until you find a coach that suits you.
faq.a4: We highly value user privacy. All personal data is protected using industry-standard encryption technology and will never be shared with third parties without permission. You can view, export, or delete your data at any time.

download.title: Download Now, Start Your Self-Transformation Journey
download.subtitle: Take action now, take the first step towards change
